name: Les Masquerades
description:
les masquerades is a fast paced platformer designed for speedrunning, with a few different abilities that can be stolen from enemies.

this game was made in about a week for a gamejam organised with a small group of people

-- KEYBOARD CONTROLS --

it is highly recommended to play with a gamepad, and those controls are self explanatory, but if you play with a keyboard:

AD: move, K: jump, L: steal
